meanings.definition: A decorative motif resembling a flower or leaf, often used in ancient Greek and Roman art and architecture.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully added an anthemion to the top of the column.
meanings.sent2: The vase was adorned with an intricate anthemion design.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel placed an anthemion on its tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like an anthemion in the garden of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The golden anthemion gleamed under the sunlight, capturing everyone's attention.
